Company Description by the company:
Who We Are

Dedicated Computing is an original design manufacturer (ODM) of proprietary, highly-engineered computing systems for blue-chip OEM customers in healthcare and life sciences, training and simulation and industrial markets.

What We Do

Dedicated Computing's systems are integrated hardware and software platforms that are optimized to meet the specific computational and performance needs of OEM applications. These systems are preconfigured with network connectivity and onboard diagnostics to enable a range of managed services capabilities.

Who We Serve

The systems and solutions we build are powering our customers' products. We work with many of the world's leading companies. Our customers make some of the most important products in industries such as healthcare, life sciences, training and simulation, and industrial. 

Our Vision

Dedicated Computing is a global technology company committed to solving the business problems of our customers through the design, development, and deployment More... of innovative technology solutions.

 Our mission is: Powering the World's Most Important Devices.

 Our customers are building devices that save lives, train people to save lives or improve the lives of others. Dedicated Computing's products and services are at the core of those devices, powering complex calculation engines, providing near instant access to and serving vast amounts of data, and making sure these devices are secure, supported and working properly.

 Our Values

 Our values are the foundation of our strategy. Our Values bring out the best in us.

 - First Things First - It's all about Customer Service

 - Stay Above the Line

 - Collaborate with a Team

 - Plan the Work and Work the Plan

 - Make a Difference

 - Step it Up

 - Enjoy the Journey Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer of automatic identification and data collection software and hardware. Data collection software systems include time and attendance, work order tracking, access control, order production management, human resources management, employee or work order scheduling, inventory control, and labor tracking. Software products incorporate barcodes and other intelligent media for automatic entry of information into computer systems. Software capabilities include printing, scanning, collecting, organizing and reporting useable information. Data collection hardware systems include wireless hand held computers, magnetic strip readers, terminals and controllers, biometric security systems. Company Description by the company:
Acumen's VIEW Suite for workforce management is a cost effective robust set of applications that help manage the most significant asset to a company; its employees and associates. Acumen's VIEW suite is easy to use and can be implemented in any or all workforce management areas that require automation. Paperwork reduction and data entry redundancy are cornerstone benefits to the VIEWsuite.

ClockVIEW time and attendance, LaborVIEW labor management, JobVIEW job tracking, HrVIEW HR and HR self service, ShiftVIEW employee scheduling and CasVIEW for access control, are workforce management modules available in bundled or separate packages. The ViewSUITE is available as a service (SaaS) hosted and/or licensed and delivered.

ClockVIEW - Acumens ClockVIEW is an employee time and attendance application. This provides simple time recording plus automation of sophisticated pay rules and eliminates errors in payroll processing. ClockVIEW helps control costs of payroll preparation.

LaborVIEW - Acumens More... LaborVIEW is an employee time and attendance application with labor and job data collection included. LaborVIEW handles simple labor time recording to sophisticated multi job multi man calculations to give exact labor costing results. LaborVIEW helps controls costs in labor costing and payroll preparation.

 PayVIEW - Acumen interfaces with all the popular payroll applications in the market place plus provides the service to integrate to any custom or in-house requirement.

 JobVIEW - Acumens JobVIEW is a work order tracking application with labor data collection included. JobVIEW handles simple labor time recording to sophisticated multi job multi man calculations to give exact labor costing results. JobVIEW helps controls costs on shop floor, tracking jobs through routings and applying standards for efficiency, standard verse actual and estimated time to completion reports. JobVIEW as well as LaborVIEW are integrated to each other as well as to ERP via PutDATA.

 ShiftVIEW - Acumens ShiftVIEW is a robust employee scheduling application. This provides simple shift definitions and reporting times or advanced automation of labor demand to employee availability and certifications.

 HrVIEW - Acumens HrVIEW is a module the employee can log into to review personal information, schedules, preferences, certifications, accrued balances and make requests for approval. HrVIEW reduces the task load and paperwork in HR and payroll. This self-service module is the dashboard for the employee, his/her supervisors and management to communicate the HR needs and wants of the individual as well as the company.

 Reporting is available for every element of data and is designed to output in multiple formats including Adobe PDF and comma separated for Excel. Acumen supports most popular report writers and can provide an ERD / Data Dictionary to allow users to build ad-hoc or custom reports. Less

Company Description by the company:
ECSI was established in 1976 as a physical security systems engineering and manufacturing company. For the past 38 years, ECSI has focused on delivering high quality, cost-effective entry control and perimeter security solutions to its U.S. Department of Defense, U.S. Department of Energy, nuclear power station, and international customers.

ECSI manufactures approved/standard product and offers a comprehensive services portfolio that includes: site survey/risk assessment, design & engineering, systems manufacturing and integration, factory acceptance testing, installation supervision, commissioning, operations and maintenance training, and preventive maintenance programs.

ECSI International is a subsidiary to the parent company, Electronic Control Security, Inc., a publicly traded company testing and training of personnel.

Company Description by the company:
C.R. Laurence Company continues to offer the glazing industry innovative, high quality products as it has for over 50 years, but with an expanding emphasis on Architectural Hardware and Services. From their nearly one million combined square feet of ISO 9001 Certified manufacturing/distribution facilities in Los Angeles, California to their 30 distribution locations throughout the United States, Canada, Australia and Europe, their goal is to provide products of the highest quality and value, and to maintain a leadership position in the glazing and metal industries.

In CRL's online catalogs you will find an extensive selection of architectural hardware for the construction of beautiful 'all-glass' storefronts and entrances with their patented Wedge-Lock Door Rails and an impressive line of Storefront Hardware. Their line of Access Control Hardware, Panic Handles, and Door Closers simplify your hardware selection process for commercial doors. CRL also offers Glass Stacking Partition Systems, More... Laguna Series 'All-Glass' Door Hardware, Standoffs, Patch Hardware, Glass Railing and Balustrade Systems, as well as a rapidly growing line of Architectural Metals, Sunshades, Column Covers, Composite and Perforated Panel Systems.

 CRL supports their extensive product lines with a Technical Sales Department through their web site at crlaurence.com. From the home page click on Contact Us, and then click on the Product Group you are interested in. It's that easy! Less

Company Description by the company:
Fralo Industries is a leading sheet metal fabricator with full-service capabilities. Established in 1979, Fralo produces high-quality sheet metal components and finished assemblies.

We have continuously invested in new technology and equipment to meet the increasing complexity and cost requirements of our customers. Our highly skilled workforce does a superb job of manufacturing to precise tolerances.

Our Erie, PA facility is over 60,000 square feet. We are equipped with laser cutting, CNC punching and forming, robotic welding, and our in-house powder coating line to serve all of your needs.

Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer of safety key interlock systems. Mechanical, electromechanical, transfer, SKRU, time delay & solenoid release. Interlocks used in switchgear, switch yards, power plants, robotic safety, machine guarding, safety access, valves, petrochemical facilities, industrial process control, air pollution control equipment, uninterruptible power supply systems & electrostatic precipitators. Special & custom designed, engineered & manufactured safety key interlock systems & equipment.
Company Description by the company:
The following are a sample of some of our products; Type B-1088 Superior Transfer Interlocks - The Superior Key Transfer Interlock, Type B-1088 is a necessary auxiliary device to many Interlock installations. The type B-1088 NEMA Transfer Enclosure was developed over a period of time and is mostly used, but not limited to, Interlock Systems for Electrostatic Precipitators.

Type B-3003 Superior Interlock Unit for Base Mounting w/ Limited Space. The Superior Locking Unit, type B-3003, is a key actuated bolt mechanism designed for miscellaneous base mounting applications where mounting space is limited and facilities are available to permit the use of a mechanical locking bolt device.

Type B-4003 Superior Interlock Unit for Flat Mounting. The Superior Locking Unit, type B-4003, is a key actuated bolt mechanism designed for many flat, surface, or sub mounting applications where mounting space is limited and facilities are available to permit the use of a mechanical locking bolt device.

Type More... B-1088-2T Superior Time Delay Transfer Interlock. The Time Delay key interlock is comprised of two lock cylinders, an electronic time delay relay, a solenoid, pushbutton and indicating light.

 Type B-986 Superior Solenoid Key Release Unit. The Superior Solenoid Key Release Unit type B-986 is available in voltages ranging from 24 to 250 volts either A.C. or D.C. It can be supplied for panel mounting unhoused, or for outdoor use with aluminum housing with gasket and dust covers. 

 Type B-8003 Superior Panel Mount Switch Interlock. The Superior switch locking unit type B-8003 is a panel mount key-actuated switch designed for sub-panel mounting either flush or protruding ¾". This switch is primarily designed for control circuits, motor controllers, circuit breakers, or any portion of an interlock system that requires a key to send an electrical signal.

 Type B-7003 Superior Interlock Unit for Front Narrow Mounting. The Superior Locking Unit, type B-7003, is a key actuated bolt mechanism designed for many front mounting applications where mounting space is limited and facilities are available to permit the use of a mechanical locking bolt device.

 Type B-5003 Superior Access Interlock Unit. The Superior Door Locking Unit, type B-5003, is an Interlocking unit designed for either surface or sub-mounting for the Interlocking of access doors to various equipment such as electrical cabinets, fuse doors, transmitter cabinets, capacitor banks, access to automated equipment, compartment or cell doors, access doors, etc. Less

Welcome to SSP! 

SSP is based in the Southeastern, USA and is the premier security systems integrator in the Southeast Region.

We provide design, installation, and service of fire alarm, burglar alarm, access control, gate entry, camera surveillance, IP cameras, intercom and other life safety and security systems.

Our installation and service teams are capable of handling small business to large commercial customers. Unlike other national security companies, SSP is small enough to provide each customer the personal attention they deserve and big enough to provide the results that you, customer want. 

SSP is dedicated to provide the highest quality of workmanship and services to our customers with honesty and integrity.

As you, the customer selects the best security vendor for their business, SSP also carefully selects each customer to ensure each customer gets the best service and attention they deserve.

Company Description by the company:
ASince 1954, Door Systems has been specializing in just one thing -- the assembly, installation, and servicing of overhead doors and dock equipment. Over the years, we've built our reputation on working with our customers to find the best solution for their needs.

To that end, we offer expert, knowledgeable consultation to all of our customers during the planning of any construction or remodeling project. Rather than follow a "one size fits all" approach to overhead doors, we tailor the doors we install to match the specific requirements of our customers. That's why we offer both custom doors as well as standard stock items in the most popular styles and colors. During the planning stages of your project, we'll meet with you on-site to discuss options to meet your organization's unique needs. 

Our services include architectural consultation for new construction and remodeling, assistance to general contractors for project planning, bidding, and installation, a new construction division More... to plan and build loading docks, entrances and door openings, maintenance and inspection service programs for all our products, consultation, planning, and installation services to help your company comply with the Americans with Disabilities Act. 

 Together, our consulting services combine cutting-edge technology and years of experience to bring our customers cost-effective, innovative solutions for even the most demanding problems. Less

Company Description by the company:
Patton solves real-world customer challenges with high-quality, right-priced products and solutions complemented by unrivaled services and support. Incorporated in 1984, Patton has developed and sustained communications product and system competence ranging from basic asynchronous serial (RS-232/422/485) communications to cloud based telephony and everything in between.

Patton delivers communications infrastructure, unified communication, cloud, and IoT-enabling solutions for government, service providers and industry. The product portfolio is made up of more than 1000 products including VoIP gateways, routers, voice session border controllers, security appliances, network extenders, interface converters, multiplexers, isolators and much more.

Patton's special project group performs project management, R&D, product development (mechanical, hardware, software and cloud), network and system design, systems integration and contract manufacturing for government, industry peers, research institutions More... and academia.

 Patton's FiberPlex group has been engineering, manufacturing and delivering secure fiber solutions to the US Government for over a quarter of a century and share that expertise with commercial and international markets. As experts in the industry, we assist all sorts of agencies, businesses, campuses, broadcasters and live production firms on how to leverage technology to solve complex communication and security problems. Company Description by the company:
About Schmersal Inc.

Founded in 1945, Schmersal specializes in the design and manufacture of industrial switches, machine safety products, position sensors and related control accessories. We are represented in more than 30 foreign countries. 

Our North American operation, Schmersal Inc., is focused on supplying machinery builders and users with safety components which satisfy the machine guarding requirements of OSHA, ANSI and the European Machinery Directive. 

Products are available at more than 120 stocking distributor locations throughout the U.S. and Canada. For the representative and/or local distributor nearest you click on "Locate Reps & Distributors" above.

Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer of switches, automation, signal & man-machine interface & safety products. Switches include safety switches, non-contact switches, limit switches, & metal & mini plastic body interlock switches, inductive non-contact switches & enabling devices. Company Description by the company:
Euchner products range from electromechanical and electronic components to complex system solutions. With this wide range of products we can provide the necessary technologies to offer the right solution for special requirements  regardless of whether these relate to reliable and precise positioning or to components and systems for safety engineering in the automation sector. With our closeness to the customer and the guarantee of reliable solutions throughout the globe, we enjoy the confidence of customers all over the world.

Quality, reliability and precision are the hallmarks of our corporate philosophy. They represent concepts and values to which we feel totally committed. At EUCHNER, quality means that all our employees take personal responsibility for the company as a whole and, in particular, for their own field of work. This individual commitment to perfection results in products which are ideally tailored to the customers needs and the requirements of the market. After all: our More... customers and their needs are the focus of all our efforts. Through efficient and effective use of resources, the promotion of personal initiative and courage in finding unusual solutions to the benefit of our customers, we ensure a high level of customer satisfaction. We familiarize ourselves with their needs, requirements and products and we learn from the experiences of our customers own customers.

Submersible, walk-through, hand-held, wireless, thermal screening and pulse induction type metal detectors available. Company Description by the company:
In the mid-1960s Charles and Eleanor Garrett introduced the world to The Hunter, the first Zero Drift, Dual Searchcoil detector ever made. And with it they espoused a new philosophy that challenged the way the world would forever view the metal detection industry. "We will build the best possible metal detector and offer the best customer service," they said. 

40 years later, as you can imagine, we're still passionate about our detectors. In fact, you might even say we're a little over zealous. But, whether your treasure's been resting at the bottom of the sea for centuries, buried in an old battlefield for decades or lost at the park yesterday, you can rest assured Garrett has engineered the right detector that will fit your needs and budget.

Company Description by the company:
Hubbell Incorporated, with a history dating back to 1888, began a series of acquisitions of prominent lighting businesses in 1963 that ultimately constituted Hubbell Lighting, Inc. In 2002, Hubbell acquired Lighting Corporation of America in one of the largest acquisitions in the history of the lighting industry, transforming Hubbell Lighting into one of the largest lighting manufacturers in North America.

As a core business platform of Hubbell Incorporated, Hubbell Lighting draws great inspiration from the company's long history of proven performance since 1888 and its culture of new product innovation.

Core technology organization focused on developing new lighting technologies

Twenty three brands of practical, innovative products and services offer lighting solutions for virtually every application

State-of-the-art research and development labs mean faster-to-market innovative product development

Largest offering of LED residential and commercial fixtures recognized by the Illuminating More... Engineering Society of North America (IESNA).

 With a commitment to achieving excellence and a focus on being recognized as the best lighting company in the industry, Hubbell Lighting knows that exceptional customer support demands professionalism before and long after the sale. Our Customer Support service operates 8:00am - 8:00pm EST Monday - Friday, providing 60 hours per week of customer support, a level much higher than industry standards. Less

Company Description by the company:
Kardex Remstar is one of the world's leading suppliers of automated storage and retrieval systems.

Each one of our products has been designed to increase productivity and improve the efficiency of your work processes. Our tailor-made solutions allow you to make optimum use of your storage space.

We have successfully installed more than 160,000 systems in manufacturing, distribution, warehouse, office and retail sectors since 1873 - proof of our ability and the commitment of our staff.

With international branches and representatives, Kardex Remstar has a local presence in many countries including the United States, Canada, and Mexico.

As part of the Kardex Group with more than 2,200 employees, our customers benefit from our expertise, service, support, and training.

Company Description by the company:
ApexCCTV provides high quality security cameras and video surveillance equipment for the commercial and industrial sectors along with many verticals such as retail, medical, law enforcement, fire departments, correctional facilities, and government agencies among many others. 

With 42 combined years of experience, we understand that having the greatest products at low prices isn't enough which is why we stress providing outstanding customer service and technical support. At ApexCCTV, you will have unlimited, free lifetime technical support and have direct access to our staff of expertly trained technicians that possess a wealth of information about the intricacies of our product line as well as in the field knowledge gained from installing every product carried in our catalog.

It is our utmost goal to provide you not only with the system you need, but with one that you will be happy. Whether it is an analog or IP security camera system, we strive to future proof our security systems in More... an effort to prolong the life of each solution and allow maximum expandability to prevent you from having to buy an entirely new system six months from now.

 You will be hard pressed to find a better deal on security and video surveillance equipment and if you do, we won't just match the price, we'll give you an additional 10% off with our 110% Price Match Guarantee!

 Contact us today to speak with one of our expert security consultants and let us help you find the system thats right for you! Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer of OEM thermal printers for integration into kiosks, ATM's, gas pumps, car washes, boarding pass terminals, security systems, fire alarm networks, industrial equipment and much more. Printer widths vary from 2-1/4 in. to 8-1/2 in. with and without cutters and presenters. Also manufacturers of OEM cutters in various widths for use with printers and other products.
Company Description by the company:
The history of Hengstler actually dates back over more than 150 years. At the beginning in 1846, the clock-maker Johannes Hengstler started the series production of gongs in the Swabian town of Aldingen in Germany. In the course of the following decades the foundation was laid for the comprehensive experience Hengstler has today with the production of counters, printers, cutters, relays and encoders. Meanwhile controllers, length and angular measuring systems have expanded the product range. In 1995 Hengstler became a member of the US corporation Danaher in Washington, DC. Danaher Corporation regularly attains annual sales of several billion US dollars. Its main business segments also comprise tools and components, process and environmental controls, Hengstler being part of the latter business segment as a focused niche business.

One of our particular strengths is the complete management of customer-specific application projects. We can provide effective and continuous support from the More... project planning and design phase right through to the finished product. Our core competence is your benefit. Apart from our long and varied experience in electromechanical and mechanical engineering, pneumatics and electronics - which is reflected in our product range - we also have special strengths in the following fields:

 ■Engineering 

 ■Production 

 ■Assembly 

 ■PCB assembly 

 ■Customizing 

 ■Worldwide support Less
